actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide certain restrictions on the use of tax-exempt bonds issued to provide offices related to sewage management.

summary.text: Denies tax-exempt status to any governmental bond if more than $100,000 or five percent of its proceeds, whichever is less, will be used to provide off-premises office space related to sewage management activities.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide certain restrictions on the use of tax-exempt bonds issued to provide offices related to sewage management.
